3,26,
1001,26,-4,26,
@6: 3,27,
1002,27,2,27,
1,27,26,27,
4,27,
1001,28,-1,28,
1005,28,6,99,0,0,5

3,26,Load into $26 (phase)
1001,26,-4,26, add $26 + lit -4-> $26

@6 3,27, Load input into $27
1002,27,2,27, $27 = $27 * 2
1,27,26,27, $27 = $27 + $26
print($27)

1001,28,-1,28, $28 = $28 - 1
1005,28,6, jump if $28 != 0 to @6
99, HALT
0, #26 (phase)
0, # 27 (input)
5 # 28()



3,8, $8 = input
1001,8,10,8, $8 = $+10
105,1,0, jump if $1(0) != 0
